DOC.brief_summary: This single-arm , open-label study evaluate efficacy safety Tarceva ( erlotinib ) patient locally advanced metastatic non-small cell lung cancer . Patients receive daily oral dos 150 mg Tarceva . The anticipated time study treatment 12 month .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Tarceva ( Erlotinib ) Patients With Locally Advanced Metastatic Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer ( TRIGGER )
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /=18 year age Locally advance metastatic nonsmall cell lung cancer Measurable disease accord Response Evaluation Criteria Solid Tumors ( RECIST ) Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status 02 Life expectancy > /=12 week Adequate hematological , liver , kidney function Previous therapy epidermal growth factor receptor metastatic disease Treatment investigational drug 3 week enrollment History neoplasm Patients symptomatic cerebral metastasis Unstable systemic disease
